divs: sighting detailsmy brother richard wanted me to contact you again. you already had a field investigator interview him about a week or two ago. he called me today and stated he seen the silver sphere ufo's again: twice on 9\6\08 and twice on 9\7\08 (today) but this time he has photos. i don't know if he as a digital camera to upload it to a pc or just an old type roll film but you might want to check the photos and\or talk to him again. ricks brother dennis in denver until rick gets his pc up and running again you can contact him through me at dbeauvais04620@peoplepc.com if you cannot get his cell. i do not have the photos on my pc. he hasn't sent them to me yet.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Waukegan
There were no other sightings in Waukegan on or around September 6th 2008
